artist: Artist: Toyohara Kunichika; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; portraits of four soldiers wearing black jackets; three small figures in LLC; red ground; sheets affixed together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Actors Ichikawa Kodanji as Seppu Shinsuke, Ichikawa Sadanji as Kishino Toshiaki, Ichikawa Danjūrō IX as Saijō Takamori, Onoe Kikugorō as Kurata Shinpachirō, Nakamura Chūtarō as Shōtarō, Onoe Kikunosuke as Magoichi, and Ichikawa Kōsaku as Tokumaru in the play Okige no kumo harau asa gochi
